data.text: @dhmontgomery Concerned that grandkids have a second virus positive test since January, schools seem to have it going around and around. Thank goodness for vaccines.

@dhmontgomery Get your authentic digital vaccines certificates registered into the database of Medicare without taking the dangerous shots. 

We do offer Government approved exemption certificates too. 

For verification and purchase contact 
 
https://t.co/yKX51g8giH

@willardtwerty @dhmontgomery I know, right?! 

Over 900,000 hypochondriacs have been so committed to their b.s., they’ve literally DIED.
@dhmontgomery David, could you do a quick overlay of cases (number) and %reinfections?

@dhmontgomery These waves are reminding of Minnesota summers. 

Time to get out and be social before the cold/covid returns!

@dhmontgomery At this point though, would we ever expect the % of reinfections to come down?

I mean, if there was a variant that somehow became dominant without reinfecring, but not sure that’s even remotely likely.

@dhmontgomery Also important to note,
Just before Delta arrived in Minnesota, cases post-Alpha were at an all time low, but reinfections remained consistent (immune compromised).

So pre-Delta the % #reinfections rose, the actual number of reinfections did not.
But Omicron is different. https://t.co/RzJ4zhf63c
